price: 47. ¿o de que este se abata sobre ellos cuando más lo teman? Ciertamente, vuestro Señor es Compasivo y Misericordioso (al no adelantar Su castigo).
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum ʿalā takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
